skins.shipDescription: Ning Hai-class Light Cruiser, Ning Hai
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Ning Hai, the first ship of the Ning Hai-class! In order to revive our nation's navy, we have been living as frugally as possible. If you waste our efforts, Commander, I'm going to be very angry with you!
skins.acquisition: You're the Commander? Well, from this day forward, I'll take the duty of supervising the fleet. I hope you'll coopera... Buns? Thank you, I'll help myself.
skins.login: Where were you? Lazing around again?! Did you bring me any food...? Hmph. Let's get to work.
skins.details: What is it? You want to watch a martial arts performance?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even if you put a giant plate of steamed buns on the table in front of me, I won't relax...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I would rather see you and the fleet become stronger instead of just myself.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You cannot protect your loved ones if you neglect your training.
skins.secretaryTouch: What, you want to have a go with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *sigh* I won't forgive you, even if you beg God for forgiveness and bribe me with a lifetime supply of steamed buns.

skins.shipDescription: Yes! … this feels good. Thank you, Commander. In order to live up to your expectations, from now on, I will be more serious around you, Commander. Hey, don't run!
skins.acquisition: Yes! … this feels good. Thank you, Commander. In order to live up to your expectations, from now on, I will be more serious around you, Commander. Hey, don't run!
skins.details: In order to save money, I'll have to cook with the most affordable ingredients I can get... Commander, come taste test this for me~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if I catch you slacking off, you'll get a taste of my new karate chops.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If I don't cheer up a bit, who is Commander and Pinghai going to depend on- Ah, I didn't mean it like that!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, don't just sit there all day, come here and do some aerobics with me to loosen up!
skins.secretaryTouch: Where in the world did Bunbun get these fancy glasses... I hope he's not trying to become a pandit.

skins.shipDescription: Summer's all about the beach! And the beach is all about good food! Let's find something good to eat, Commander.
skins.acquisition: Summer's all about the beach! And the beach is all about good food! Let's find something good to eat, Commander.
skins.login: *panting*... S-sorry, Commander... I wound up on some weird uninhabited island... *panting*... I swam away for dear life and finally made it back... *panting*...
skins.details: How'd I even get lost...? My map of the local sea should be perfectly accurate...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wanna geh closer to tha firrwurks... Lemme wide on your shouldersh, Commander~! Err... N-no! I'm not drunk!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Come here, Ping Hai. Let me take care of that stain on your lips.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ping Hai! You can't get careless just because we're not in battC Blurph!
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm tired and my muscles hurt... But it was all worth it for that awesome beachside barbeque!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Calm down, Commander, I'm trying to watch the fireworks... Your shoulders hurt? Come on, I'm not that heavy!

skins.shipDescription: Happy Mid-Autumn Festival! By the way, I heard that if you prayed to the moon today, you'll become as pretty as the Goddess of the Moon! ...Eh, you're really doing it?!
skins.acquisition: Happy Mid-Autumn Festival! By the way, I heard that if you prayed to the moon today, you'll become as pretty as the Goddess of the Moon! ...Eh, you're really doing it?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Oh gosh, mooncake! Yes! Om nom nom nom!
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's a holiday, so nobody will mind if I drink a little... right? *gulp*, *gulp*... Ahahaha... Something here smells like sweet osmanthus~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Da Bao, Baobao, do you want some mooncake too? Here you go.
skins.secretaryTouch: The whole family's all gathered for the Mid-Autumn Festival! Happy holidays, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: For the last time! I'm not a bunny girl, I'm a moon rabbit! Got it?!

skins.shipDescription: We haven't had to worry as much about things like food since we joined the fleet, but that doesn't mean we can just throw money around...! Anyway, I'm the older of the "Dragon Sisters," Ning Hai! Great to be here!
skins.acquisition: We haven't had to worry as much about things like food since we joined the fleet, but that doesn't mean we can just throw money around...! Anyway, I'm the older of the "Dragon Sisters," Ning Hai! Great to be here!
skins.login: Thank you very mC! It's you, Commander.
skins.details: Look, all this idol stuff is just work, okay! Don't start thinking I actually enjoy it!
skins.secretaryIdle1: C- Commander... "Jia you! ☆" Was that cute enough...? Don't look at me like that! This is serious business right here!
skins.secretaryIdle2: After studying all that kung fu, Idol dancing is a piece of cake for me and Ping Hai! Hah hah!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, right! Commander, next time me and Ping Hai put out a single, we'll definitely save you one.
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't worry, I'm wearing shorts underneath. And anyway if somebody tried something gross, I've got a roundhouse kick with their name on it!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, what are you spacing out for? Over here! They say that you'll have good fortune if you give this thing a shake!
skins.acquisition: Commander, what are you spacing out for? Over here! They say that you'll have good fortune if you give this thing a shake!
skins.details: Ping Hai can get away with it, but I can't believe YOU don't have a clear schedule for this vacation, Commander... Forget it, I'll make you one!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmph. Sure, we got this vacation for free, but we can't squander our money... Ping Hai! Don't go off ordering food! You too, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've vaguely felt it since way back, but the Sakura Empire and Dragon Empery are similar in a lot of ways. But also dissimilar in many ways, obviously. Those are what feel fresh.
skins.secretaryTouch: It's so crowded over here... Listen, um, could you hold my hand? ... I mean, with me.

skins.JPClientName: ゴ`ジャス?ヴァイオレット
skins.shipDescription: Yat Sen said this look would be best for a party, but, is it really okay? I'm not used to having my hair down like this...
skins.acquisition: Yat Sen said this look would be best for a party, but, is it really okay? I'm not used to having my hair down like this...
skins.login: This cake is for you, Commander! T-take it!
skins.details: Yat Sen, Ping Hai, and I made this cake for the party, with the help of some other girls. It had to be big enough to feed everyone... But a big baozi probably would have been better than a big cake... Ahem! N-never mind.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Da Bao! Bring the next slice over here! Pay attention!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I told her not to, but I'm still worried Ping Hai is going to gobble up the cake before she finishes passing it out... I better go keep an eye on her!
skins.secretaryIdle3: While handing out all this cake I realized just how many friends Ping Hai and I have made lately... Heh heh.
skins.secretaryTouch: Passing out the cake...? That's not a job for a commander! Leave it to me and Ping Hai, and of course Da Bao and Baobao!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Waaah! C-Commander! What if I drop the cake?!
